resources.string:
Every app requires some way to authenticate their users, the Hasura AUTH APIs provide just that.

There are different types of providers that you can opt for, like, USERNAME/PASSWORD, MOBILE/OTP, EMAIL/PASSWORD, FACEBOOK, GOOGLE etc.

This example uses the USERNAME/PASSWORD provider to authenticate the users. The code for this activity can be found in **AuthActivity**
Looks like you are already logged in. To logout, click on the logout button.
